show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: Arthritis
content:
Dr. <!--more--> Eugene Zampieron, ND, MH, www.drznaturally.com and Ellen Kamhi, PhD, RN,www.naturalnurse.com get together as co-hosts on today’s show.  They will discuss their book,ARTHRITIS, The Alternative Medicine  Definitive Guide.
 They provide  in depth information on natural therapies that can be used to synergistically support healthy cartilage integrity, optimize cartilage matrix composition and support the maintenance and natural repair processes of connective tissue.
These can decrease pain and inflammation by providing optimal support for maintaining healthy cytokine balance and leukotriene and prostaglandin metabolism.
Learn what YOU can do to reduce inflammation and feel great!
 Contact: 800-829-0918 www.naturalnurse.com , www.drznaturally.com
